title.full: Serious Sam HD The First and Second Encounters
title.reduced: Serious Sam HD The First and Second Encounters

description.full: Serious Sam is back to claim his throne as the king of first-person shooter mayhem! Re-worked from the ground up, the indie sensation from Croteam returns with spectacularly upgraded visuals and an overhauled multiplayer focus.  Battle against the relentless hordes of Mental’s army!  Watch absolute chaos unfold online with up to 8 players in over 15 groundbreaking co-op and death-match modes.   Fight across four different spectacular worlds.
